search.query: sourcetype=ivanti:securitycontrols:scandetails name=$machineName$ currentPatchStatus!="Patch Installed" | table smachdomainname, name, lastcheckin, currentPatchStatus, patchSeverity, patchbulletinid, patchbulletinurl, patchqnumbers, prodname, smachosid | rename smachdomainname as Domain, name as Machine, lastcheckin as "Last Check-In Date", currentPatchStatus as "Patch Status", patchSeverity as Severity, patchbulletinid as KB, patchbulletinurl as URL, patchqnumbers as QNumbers, prodname as Product, smachosid as "OS ID"
